scenes.description: Kiara continues her high-energy performance, singing her original song 'HINOTORI' while dancing on the 3D stage.

Following the performance, Kiara transitions into an MC segment where she expresses her excitement about performing her songs live in 3D. She then introduces and talks with callers Gawr Gura and Mori Calliope.

subtitles.original: Tell me I can hear it clearly
subtitles.english: Tell me I can hear it clearly

subtitles.original: Tell me 声が聞こえに
subtitles.english: Tell me, I can hear your voice

subtitles.original: あらぶる鼓動は 傷を焦がす
subtitles.english: My wild heartbeat burns my wounds

subtitles.original: 焔降り注ぐ空に 身を焦がして
subtitles.english: In the sky where flames pour down, burning my body

subtitles.original: 乱れ咲く赤は ベリゲーション
subtitles.english: The blooming red is variegation

subtitles.original: 数多重なる試練も 引き抜いてみせる
subtitles.english: I'll overcome even the numerous trials

subtitles.original: I will learn to keep on fighting
subtitles.english: I will learn to keep on fighting

subtitles.original: to the dawn
subtitles.english: to the dawn

subtitles.original: 例えば先の見えない ゼロの境界
subtitles.english: For example, the unseen boundary of zero

subtitles.original: 迷い込んだとしても
subtitles.english: Even if I get lost

subtitles.original: 何度も繰り返される 心の終焉
subtitles.english: The end of the heart repeated over and over

subtitles.original: 底に残った Answer
subtitles.english: The Answer left at the bottom

subtitles.original: Daybreak I will never give up
subtitles.english: Daybreak I will never give up

subtitles.original: Daybreak 羽が朽ちても
subtitles.english: Daybreak, even if my wings rot away

subtitles.original: 消せない強さは 時の標
subtitles.english: The inextinguishable strength is a guide through time

subtitles.original: 灰が舞い上がる大地 身を焦がして
subtitles.english: In the land where ashes dance, burning my body

subtitles.original: 燃ゆる夜明けの中 目を覚ます
subtitles.english: Waking up in the burning dawn

subtitles.original: 刃交わり切り裂き 交わした契りは
subtitles.english: Blades crossing and slashing, the vow we made

subtitles.original: Rise and true, come to light at the break of day
subtitles.english: Rise and true, come to light at the break of day

subtitles.original: I've been trying to find my destiny
subtitles.english: I've been trying to find my destiny

subtitles.original: But they keep pushing and pulling me astray
subtitles.english: But they keep pushing and pulling me astray

subtitles.original: If I go wrong what awaits me in the dark
subtitles.english: If I go wrong what awaits me in the dark

subtitles.original: Could you tell me please where I need to go
subtitles.english: Could you tell me please where I need to go

subtitles.original: Tell me I can hear it clearly
subtitles.english: Tell me I can hear it clearly

subtitles.original: Tell me 声が聞こえに
subtitles.english: Tell me, I can hear your voice

subtitles.original: 漲る決意は 影を払う
subtitles.english: Overflowing determination clears the shadows

subtitles.original: 焔降り注ぐ空に 身を焦がして
subtitles.english: In the sky where flames pour down, burning my body

subtitles.original: 乱れ咲く赤は ベリゲーション
subtitles.english: The blooming red is variegation

subtitles.original: 数多重なる試練も 引き抜いてみせる
subtitles.english: I'll overcome even the numerous trials

subtitles.original: Blazing flames show me the path to luminous
subtitles.english: Blazing flames show me the path to luminous

subtitles.original: And in the next plateau I promise I will find you
subtitles.english: And in the next plateau I promise I will find you

subtitles.original: Yay!
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: How was that?
subtitles.english: How was that?

subtitles.original: Yay! We just did the first-ever performance of "Fever Night"...
subtitles.english: Yay! We just did the first-ever performance of "Fever Night"...

subtitles.original: ...and "HINOTORI"! Yeah! The classic "HINOTORI"!
subtitles.english: ...and "HINOTORI"! Yeah! The classic "HINOTORI"!

subtitles.original: I bet you all wanted to see this once again!
subtitles.english: I bet you all wanted to see this once again!

subtitles.original: But "Fever Night" is very new! My newest single!
subtitles.english: But "Fever Night" is very new! My newest single!

subtitles.original: So I hope you're listening to it a lot. Are you? Of course!
subtitles.english: So I hope you're listening to it a lot. Are you? Of course!

subtitles.original: Thank you for always streaming both of my songs. Thank you very much for the support!
subtitles.english: Thank you for always streaming both of my songs. Thank you very much for the support!

subtitles.original: So! You thought I was done with callers, huh?
subtitles.english: So! You thought I was done with callers, huh?

subtitles.original: No, no, no! There's more! There's more, there's more!
subtitles.english: No, no, no! There's more! There's more, there's more!

subtitles.original: Hmm... aren't we missing some Myth members?
subtitles.english: Hmm... aren't we missing some Myth members?

subtitles.original: Yes, we are! Of course we are!
subtitles.english: Yes, we are! Of course we are!

subtitles.original: So please come and say hello to Gura and Cali!
subtitles.english: So please come and say hello to Gura and Cali!

subtitles.original: hololive ID 2nd Generation Pavolia Reine
subtitles.english: hololive ID 2nd Generation Pavolia Reine

subtitles.original: Wee-woo, wee-woo, wee-woo!
subtitles.english: Wee-woo, wee-woo, wee-woo!

subtitles.original: I-I-I wouldn't do...
subtitles.english: I-I-I wouldn't do...

subtitles.original: Howdy!
subtitles.english: Howdy!

subtitles.original: Hi! Howdy! Kikiriki!
subtitles.english: Hi! Howdy! Kikiriki!

subtitles.original: Hello! Happy Birthday Kiara!
subtitles.english: Hello! Happy Birthday Kiara!

subtitles.original: Happy Birthday!
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: Thank you! It is indeed...
subtitles.english: Thank you! It is indeed...

subtitles.original: You are a birthday!
subtitles.english: You are a birthday!

subtitles.original: Well, you could say it's not my birthday, but it's my birb-day! Birb-birb-birb-day!
subtitles.english: Well, you could say it's not my birthday, but it's my birb-day! Birb-birb-birb-day!

subtitles.original: Ah, I get it. You made a funny word joke.
subtitles.english: Ah, I get it. You made a funny word joke.

subtitles.original: As expected of Tenchou! Looking so cute!
subtitles.english: As expected of Tenchou! Looking so cute!

subtitles.original: Thanks! Finally, finally I can show off...
subtitles.english: Thanks! Finally, finally I can show off...

subtitles.original: ...the body in 3D for a whole stream! Yeah!
subtitles.english: ...the body in 3D for a whole stream! Yeah!

subtitles.original: It's so detailed and beautiful!
subtitles.english: It's so detailed and beautiful!

subtitles.original: Oh, thank you! Please keep looking at it! Which part do you like the most?
subtitles.english: Oh, thank you! Please keep looking at it! Which part do you like the most?

subtitles.original: My figure is very nice!
subtitles.english: My figure is very nice!

subtitles.original: The tummy window!
subtitles.english: The tummy window!

subtitles.original: Oh, the tummy window is cute! Yes! Hip-scope!
subtitles.english: Oh, the tummy window is cute! Yes! Hip-scope!
